meanings.definition: Eager to acquire wealth or possessions.
meanings.sent1: The acquisitive man quickly bought the new car.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her acquisitive nature when it comes to collecting antiques.
meanings.sent3: The acquisitive squirrel hoarded all the nuts in the park.
meanings.sent4: His acquisitive behavior towards success knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The acquisitive child eagerly grabbed all the toys at the store.

meanings.definition: Having a strong desire to obtain and possess things.
meanings.sent1: The acquisitive shopper couldn't resist buying more clothes.
meanings.sent2: The company's acquisitive attitude led to the acquisition of several smaller businesses.
meanings.sent3: The acquisitive magpie collected shiny objects for its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her acquisitive tendencies extended to wanting the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The acquisitive collector was always on the lookout for rare stamps.
